abstract.t: This draft describes a profile for compressing SCTP/IP using the Robust Header Compression Formal Notation. The RObust Header Compression [1] scheme is designed to compress packet headers over error prone channels. It is built around an extensible core framework that can be tailored to compress new protocol stacks by adding additional ROHC profiles. This profile describes a new profile for ROHC which will allow SCTP/ IP headers to be compressed.
